China says bomb, death threats made against its Washington embassy tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748094 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748094/china-says-bomb-death-threats-made-against-its-washington-embassy/story/ Bomb and death threats have been made against the Chinese embassy in Washington, Chinese Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Hua Chunying said on Wednesday, blaming the US government. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 02:45:05 +0800
Female leaders doing 'better job' in virus crisis, says ECB head tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748092 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748092/female-leaders-doing-better-job-in-virus-crisis-says-ecb-head/story/ Female leaders are doing a better job handling the coronavirus crisis, European Central Bank chief Christine Lagarde said Wednesday, praising them for their honest communication and for showing they cared. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 01:28:51 +0800
Don't expect first COVID-19 vaccinations until early 2021 - WHO tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748091 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748091/who-vaccinations/story/ Researchers are making good progress in developing vaccines against COVID-19, with a handful in late-stage trials, but their first use cannot be expected until early 2021, a World Health Organization (WHO) expert said on Wednesday. Thu, 23 Jul 2020 00:55:46 +0800

Global COVID-19 cases reach almost 15M, death toll at 616,965 with 8.3M recoveries tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748085 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748085/global-covid-19-cases-reach-almost-15m-death-toll-at-616-965-with-8-3m-recoveries/story/ At least 14,977,470 cases of coronavirus have been registered in 196 countries and territories. Of these, at least 8,338,900 are now considered recovered while at least 616,965 people have died since the outbreak emerged in China last December, according to a tally from official sources compiled by AFP at 1100 GMT on Wednesday. Wed, 22 Jul 2020 23:41:18 +0800

Wed, 22 Jul 2020 23:35:38 +0800

US orders China to shut Houston consulate; China calls it unprecedented escalation tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748075 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748075/us-orders-china-to-shut-houston-consulate-china-calls-it-unprecedented-escalation/story/ The United States has told China to close its consulate in Houston, both countries said on Wednesday, further deteriorating bilateral ties, and a source said Beijing was considering shutting the US consulate in Wuhan in retaliation. Saan titira yong ibang mga kasamahan namin dito,” a resident said. Wed, 22 Jul 2020 21:51:19 +0800
